content: looking for a quick and colorful scarf project the fanfare scarf is crocheted with just one ball of variegated yarn and a 4 mm g hook it s easy to adjust and adds a fun splash of color to your fall and winter looks this is just one of the patterns included in our scarf of the month club collection **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d **unique features-** reversible design for versatile styling written pattern for easy following dk weight yarn for luxurious feel perfect for gifting or personal use **materials needed-** hook 4mm us size 6 0 yarn alula double knit dk weight 363-364 yards gauge 15 stitches by 12 row = 4 inches in pattern stitch **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **♥** rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
